User interface boundary class for Staff

    menu_GenerateReport()
    Generates Staff report via ReportController.generateReport(Camp, int, String, boolean) Allow Staff to select whether to generate report for all Camps or filter some Camps Allows Staff to select filter to choose the order which the attendees and committee appears Calls menu_SearchForCamp() to filter Camp
    static void
    menu_ManageMyCamp(Camp camp)
    Displays more options for a Staff to see more about the Camp Calls menu_ViewSignUps(Camp) to see all the signups Calls menu_ViewEnquiries(Camp) to see all Enquirys Calls menu_ViewSuggestions(Camp) to see all Suggestions Calls menu_EditMyCamp(Camp) to edit an existing Camp Allows for deletion of Camp
    private static ArrayList<Camp>
    menu_SearchForCamp()
    Filters a camp by certain attributes and displays the search results through menu_ViewCamps(ArrayList) returns an ArrayList of Camp Attributes Camp name Camp start date Camp end date Camp faculty Camp location A certain Attendee A certain Committee member Calls SearchController methods for filtering

    Sets status of Suggestion to APPROVED or REJECTED

      public StaffUI()

  • Method Details

    • displayMenu

      public static void displayMenu()
      The main menu. Only point of exit is through Logout

    • menu_ViewCamps

      public static void menu_ViewCamps(ArrayList<Camp> camps)
      Displays a list of Camps and allows the user to select camps to navigate into each Camp to see more details
      Parameters:
      camps - ArrayList

    • menu_SearchForCamp

      private static ArrayList<Camp> menu_SearchForCamp()
      Filters a camp by certain attributes and displays the search results through menu_ViewCamps(ArrayList)
      returns an ArrayList of Camp
      Attributes
      • Camp name
      • Camp start date
      • Camp end date
      • Camp faculty
      • Camp location
      • A certain Attendee
      • A certain Committee member
      Calls SearchController methods for filtering
      Returns:
      camps ArrayList

    • menu_ViewMyCamps

      public static void menu_ViewMyCamps()
      Allows Staff to see list of Camps created Allows navigation into each Camp to see more options via menu_ManageMyCamp(Camp)

    • menu_ManageMyCamp

      public static void menu_ManageMyCamp(Camp camp)
      Displays more options for a Staff to see more about the Camp
      Calls menu_ViewSignUps(Camp) to see all the signups
      Calls menu_ViewEnquiries(Camp) to see all Enquirys
      Calls menu_ViewSuggestions(Camp) to see all Suggestions
      Calls menu_EditMyCamp(Camp) to edit an existing Camp
      Allows for deletion of Camp
      Parameters:
      camp - camp created by current user

    • menu_ViewSignUps

      private static void menu_ViewSignUps(Camp camp)
      Displays all attendees and committee member of a Camp as well as their roles
      Parameters:
      camp -

    • menu_ViewEnquiries

      public static void menu_ViewEnquiries(Camp camp)
      Displays all Enquirys of a Camp
      Also allows user to reply to an Enquiry via menu_AddReplyToEnquiry(Camp, Enquiry)
      Parameters:
      camp -

    • menu_AddReplyToEnquiry

      private static void menu_AddReplyToEnquiry(Camp camp, Enquiry enquiry)
      Creates and adds Reply to an Enquiry from a Camp
      Parameters:
      camp -
      enquiry -

    • menu_ViewSuggestions

      public static void menu_ViewSuggestions(Camp camp)
      Displays all Suggestion of a Camp
      Allows Staff to set status of Suggestion to APPROVED or REJECTED via menu_SetSuggestionStatus(Suggestion)
      Parameters:
      camp -

    • menu_SetSuggestionStatus

      public static void menu_SetSuggestionStatus(Suggestion suggestion)
      Sets status of Suggestion to APPROVED or REJECTED
      Parameters:
      suggestion -

    • menu_EditMyCamp

      public static void menu_EditMyCamp(Camp camp)
      Allows Staff to edit attributes of an existing Camp

      Attributes

      • name
      • location
      • description
      • startDate
      • endDate
      • regCloseDate
      • openToFaculty
      • totalSlots
      • commSlots
      • visibleToStudents
      Gets new information but does not save, allows exit without saving
      Parameters:
      camp -

    • menu_GenerateReport

      public static void menu_GenerateReport()
      Generates Staff report via ReportController.generateReport(Camp, int, String, boolean)
      Allow Staff to select whether to generate report for all Camps or filter some Camps
      Allows Staff to select filter to choose the order which the attendees and committee appears
      Calls menu_SearchForCamp() to filter Camp

    • menu_CreateNewCamp

      public static void menu_CreateNewCamp()
      Allows Staff to create new Camp

      Attributes

      • name
      • location
      • description
      • startDate
      • endDate
      • regCloseDate
      • openToFaculty
      • totalSlots
      • commSlots
      • visibleToStudents
